name: Arthematix Design Template
description:
Here you go guys, my template for quick starts with your atomic designs. Check out the "Atoms" page, play in playground, define the atoms, molecules, organisms and templates to create you pages. There's lots of color styles so you can iterate visual, "DM Sans" font configured for 4px grids, to maintain rhythm, buttons and form fields.

Duplicate the file in your drafts and start your design game.


Contact

Hit me up on Twitter and ask your design questions or feedback on Discord.
